##Introduction to R

###Basic Commands
####Defining Variables
```{r}
x <- 5
x
y = 9
y
```
####Vector
Create a Vector of Numbers
```{r}
x = c (1,3,2,5)
x
```
Addition of two Vectors
```{r}
x = c (1,3,2,5)
y = c (2,4,3,6)
x + y
```
####Using Functions
```{r}
x = c(1,3,2,5)
length(x)
```
Using the Help for functions bei ?functionname
```{r}
?length()
```


####Matrix
Create a Matrix
```{r}
x = matrix(data=c(1,2,3,4),nrow=2,ncol=2)
x
```
Short version
```{r}
x = matrix(c(1,2,3,4),2,2)
```

####Objects
List all of the saved objects(data and functions)
```{r}
ls()
```
Remove objects
```{r}
rm(y)
ls()
```
Remove all objects
```{r}
rm(list=ls())
ls()
```
